verbs.description: halloween safety tips for trick - or - treaters halloween [V: is] meant to be a holiday of fun but a report finds there are some health risks to watch out for a 2012 state farm study found that children are twice as likely to die on halloween than any other day a major cause of these deaths walking in the street
